data: David Chen is a Senior Software Engineer specializing in backend systems with a focus on scalable microservices architecture.
David Chen has over a decade of experience building high-performance backend systems for Fortune 500 companies.
David Chen is based in Seattle, WA, US.
David Chen holds a Master’s in Computer Science from MIT.
David Chen is proficient in Go, Java, and Python.
David Chen leads a team of 12 engineers in developing cloud-native applications at EnterpriseX.
David Chen’s research notes are based on SEC filings and the company website.
David Chen reviewed the EnterpriseX Q3 report for a tech leadership overview.
